attributes.action: Outlaw the 'vulture funds' which are undoing the good work of thousands by purchasing poor countries' debts and charging them extortionate interest payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This disgusting practice makes millions for the 'vultures' and prevents some of the world's poorest countries from making headway out of poverty. Zambia, for example, will spend the entire sum saved this year in debt relief, which many of us campaigned hard for, in servicing their debt which now belongs to a private investment company. This is likely to affect, among other services, medical care for children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
